csw:Record.dc:title: GLOBAL OCEAN MEAN DYNAMIC TOPOGRAPHY
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:'''
Mean Dynamic Topography that combines the global CNES-CLS18 MDT, the Black Sea CMEMS2020 MDT and the Med Sea CMEMS2020 MDT. It is an estimate of the mean over the 1993-2012 period of the sea surface height above geoid. This is consistent with the reference time period also used in the DUACS products
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00150
